author: Alberto Nardelli, Joey D'Urso
title: Italy’s Far-Right And Nationalist Leaders Are Pushing Debunked Conspiracy Theories About The Coronavirus To Millions Of Followers
description: Struggling for attention, Italy’s former deputy prime minister and others are sharing false claims the virus was engineered in a Chinese lab. View Entire Post ›
content:
Opposition parties are going to oppose. Populists will be populists. But in the middle of a global pandemic, misinformation can spread panic and even cost lives.
As the coronavirus swept through Italy, infecting tens of thousands of people and killing more t… [+5141 chars]
